elements.name: question4
elements.title: Where do you use a protected space?
elements.correctAnswer: unattractive separation at the right edge of the text, e.g. 15 km (km on new line, spelling rule)

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Where do you use a conditional hyphen?
elements.correctAnswer: unattractive separation at the right edge of the text (e.g. asparagus-the)

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Where do you use a manual line break?
elements.correctAnswer: Date does not quite fit on one line (not easy to read)

elements.name: question3
elements.title: Where do you use a manual page break?
elements.correctAnswer: Start new page instead of paragraphs (many empty paragraphs)

elements.name: question5
elements.title: How do you quickly close a document, the associated program and shut down the PC?
elements.correctAnswer: 1. Alt + F4 (file closed); 2. ALT + F4 (program closed); 3. Alt + F4 and OK (PC is shut down)
